displayProperties.name: Desperation
displayProperties.description: Reloading after a precision final blow or a final blow with a Cursed Thrall explosion increases your rate of fire and improves stability and aim assist.

displayProperties.name: Wild Card
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon have a chance to create experimental submunitions at the target's location.

displayProperties.name: Whirling Maelstrom
displayProperties.description: Destroying a Tangle will weave a violent, writhing mass of [Strand] Strand fibers. The Strand mass seeks out and damages targets, emitting Unraveling projectiles when it defeats them.

displayProperties.name: Barrel Constrictor
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon significantly reduce the projectile spread of its next shot for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Property: Undecidable
displayProperties.description: Damage type matches your subclass.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Highly Commendable
displayProperties.description: Adds a highly commendable appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Crystalline Breakout
displayProperties.description: Adds a crystalline breakout appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Loyal Moths
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon create a loyal moth. The moth will seek out nearby targets and detonate, damaging and blinding them.

displayProperties.name: High Ground
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus damage when attacking targets from higher ground. Increases reload.

displayProperties.name: Sword Logic
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage. The strength and duration of the bonus increases when more powerful targets are defeated.

displayProperties.name: Winged Eclipse
displayProperties.description: Loyal moths damage targets and aid your allies.

displayProperties.name: Weavewalk
displayProperties.description:
[###DestinyNamedSubstitutions.ui_player_action_air_dodge_button###] [###DestinyNamedSubstitutions.ui_player_action_air_dodge_verb###] : Dodge while airborne to enter the weave, gaining damage resistance from combatants and players. Reactivate your air dodge or cast your Rift to exit the weave.

While in the weave, you generate perched Threadlings over time.

displayProperties.name: Precision Instrument
displayProperties.description: Dealing sustained damage increases precision damage.

displayProperties.name: Beyond Sight
displayProperties.description: Adds a beyond sight appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Loose Change
displayProperties.description: Applying an elemental debuff to a target increases this weapon's reload speed for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Arc/Strand Siphon Combo
displayProperties.description: Combines the Arc and Strand Siphon mods into one.

displayProperties.name: Void/Strand Siphon Combo
displayProperties.description: Combines the Void and Strand Siphon mods into one.

displayProperties.name: Solar/Strand Siphon Combo
displayProperties.description: Combines the Solar and Strand Siphon mods into one.

displayProperties.name: Diviner's Discount
displayProperties.description: All Scavenger mods are discounted.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization I
displayProperties.description: Greatly improves the benefits provided by the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin traits.

displayProperties.name: Semi-Auto Striker
displayProperties.description: If you have fewer than 2 stacks of Armor Charge, rapid precision shots with Bows, Snipers, and Scout Rifles generate an Armor Charge.

displayProperties.name: Refreshing Pickups
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Tangle or Elemental Orb grants energy to your least-powered ability.

displayProperties.name: Communal Pickups
displayProperties.description: When an ally destroys or picks up your Tangle or Elemental Orb, the Tangle cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and you gain bonus damage with weapons matching your subclass for 10 seconds.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Fury
displayProperties.description: While stunned, Champions take bonus damage from your abilities and Elemental Orb damage.

displayProperties.name: Overload Machine Guns
displayProperties.description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Machine Gun stuns unshielded combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Orbs: Void
displayProperties.description: While using a Void subclass, Void weapon final blows have a chance to spawn a Void Elemental Orb. Void Orbs can be thrown to create a Void explosion that makes enemies it damages volatile.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization II
displayProperties.description: Weapons with the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin traits are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Thanatotic Tangles
displayProperties.description: Strand weapon final blows have a chance to generate a Tangle.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Orbs: Solar
displayProperties.description: While using a Solar subclass, Solar weapon final blows have a chance to spawn a Solar Elemental Orb. Solar Orbs can be thrown to create a Solar explosion that scorches targets it damages.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Orbs: Arc
displayProperties.description: While using an Arc subclass, Arc weapon final blows have a chance to spawn an Arc Elemental Orb. Arc Orbs can be thrown to create an Arc explosion that jolts targets it damages.

displayProperties.name: High Ground
displayProperties.description: Gain bonus damage when attacking targets from higher ground.

displayProperties.name: Barrel Constrictor
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon reduce the projectile spread of its next shot for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Shooting Star
displayProperties.description: Celebrate your achievements with style and alacrity!

displayProperties.name: Nadir Focus
displayProperties.description: Sustained fire increases accuracy and range. Increases lunge distance for Swords, and projectile velocity for Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Loose Change
displayProperties.description: Applying an elemental debuff to a target increases this weapon's reload speed for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Berserk Rush
displayProperties.description: Weapon enrages faster while amplified. Final blows with this weapon make you amplified.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Munitions
displayProperties.description: Combatant final blows with Tangles or Elemental Orbs have a chance to drop Special or Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Frenzied Stacks
displayProperties.description: Your Armor Charges grant bonus damage to your thrown Tangles or Elemental Orbs. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

displayProperties.name: Monochromatic Maestro
displayProperties.description: Dealing elemental ability damage increases matching weapon damage, and elemental weapon damage increases matching ability damage. Bonus granted is 10% for 5 seconds.

displayProperties.name: Rapid-Fire Ranger
displayProperties.description: Rapid precision hits made from long range weaken the target.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Embrace
displayProperties.description: Subclass elemental buffs grant you bonus recovery and damage resistance against combatant attacks of the matching element type.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Sugar Rush
displayProperties.description: Adds a sugar rush appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Fusion
displayProperties.description:
Aiming down sights for a brief period with any Fusion Rifle you are wielding loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Orbs: Arc
displayProperties.description: While using an Arc subclass, Arc weapon final blows have a chance to spawn an Arc Elemental Orb. Arc Orbs can be thrown to create an Arc explosion that jolts targets it damages.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Orbs: Solar
displayProperties.description: While using a Solar subclass, Solar weapon final blows have a chance to spawn a Solar Elemental Orb. Solar Orbs can be thrown to create a Solar explosion that scorches targets it damages.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization II
displayProperties.description: Weapons with the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin traits are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Orbs: Void
displayProperties.description: While using a Void subclass, Void weapon final blows have a chance to spawn a Void Elemental Orb. Void Orbs can be thrown to create a Void explosion that makes enemies it damages volatile.

displayProperties.name: Thanatotic Tangles
displayProperties.description: Strand weapon final blows have a chance to generate a Tangle.

displayProperties.name: Enlightened Action
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage improves reload speed and handling.

displayProperties.name: Percussive Flames
displayProperties.description: Burning Maul and Consecration create flame cyclones.

displayProperties.name: Heal Clip
displayProperties.description: Reloading shortly after dealing a final blow grants Cure to you and your nearby allies.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Auto Rifle
displayProperties.description: Your equipped Auto Rifles fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Auto Rifles are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Scout Rifle
displayProperties.description: Aiming down the sights of a Scout Rifle for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Scout Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Piercing Bowstring
displayProperties.description:
Bows gain shield-piercing arrows, which bypass combatant defenses.

Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Fusion
displayProperties.description:
Aiming down sights for a brief period with any Fusion Rifle you are wielding loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Overload Hand Cannon
displayProperties.description:
Landing consecutive hits with any Hand Cannon you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Enlightened Action
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage significantly improves reload speed and handling.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage for an improved duration. The strength and duration of the bonus increases when more powerful targets are defeated.

displayProperties.name: Cursebringer
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows trigger an explosion.

displayProperties.description: Your Armor Charges grant bonus damage to your thrown Tangles or Elemental Orbs. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

displayProperties.description: Combatant final blows with Tangles or Elemental Orbs have a chance to drop Special or Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.description: Dealing elemental ability damage increases matching weapon damage, and elemental weapon damage increases matching ability damage. Bonus granted is 10% for 5 seconds.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Embrace
displayProperties.description: Subclass elemental buffs grant you bonus recovery and damage resistance against combatant attacks of the matching element type.

displayProperties.name: Sundering Glare
displayProperties.description: Rapid precision hits against distant combatants weaken them for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Relentless Tracker
displayProperties.description: Improves weapon damage after damaging a target with an ability.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Fury
displayProperties.description: While stunned, Champions take bonus damage from your abilities and Elemental Orb damage.

displayProperties.name: Communal Pickups
displayProperties.description: When an ally destroys or picks up your Tangle or Elemental Orb, the Tangle cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and you gain bonus damage with weapons matching your subclass for 10 seconds.

displayProperties.name: Overload Machine Guns
displayProperties.description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Machine Guns grants bullets that stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.description: Picking up a Tangle or Elemental Orb grants energy to your least-powered ability.

displayProperties.description: If you have fewer than 2 stacks of Armor Charge, rapid precision shots with Bows, Snipers, and Scout Rifles generate an Armor Charge.

displayProperties.name: Head Rush
displayProperties.description: Standing up after crouching for a short time grants this weapon a brief period of improved handling and reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Property: Irreducible
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action] : Consume your grenade to load a large [projectile|shape|language] that generates an elemental explosion on impact.

displayProperties.name: Banner of War
displayProperties.description:
Defeat a target with a melee attack, finisher, or Sword to raise a Banner of War that pulses with energy, periodically healing nearby allies and increasing melee and Sword damage. 

Targets defeated by you and nearby allies charge the banner, increasing the speed of its pulses.

displayProperties.name: Stochastic Vengeance
displayProperties.description: At 5 stacks of Markov Chain, [Alternate Weapon Action]  - switches between your melee attack and Monte Carlo's bayonet. Landing a bayonet melee hit grants melee energy.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Animating Love
displayProperties.description: Adds an animating love appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: One with the Void
displayProperties.description: Improves duration, damage, and durability of Void Souls.

displayProperties.name: Corrupted Nucleosynthesis
displayProperties.description: Enrages when dealing or sustaining damage.

displayProperties.name: Heal Clip
displayProperties.description: Reloading after dealing a final blow grants Cure to you and your nearby allies. You have additional time to perform the reload.
